fashion_and_beauty.details: Her own shapewear and loungewear line, focusing on comfort and neutral tones.
Beige, cream, olive, and brown tones for home decor and clothing.
High fashion brand she frequently wears and collaborates with.

food_and_drink.details: Specifically from Cafe Du Monde in New Orleans.
Her go-to order from Health Nut in Calabasas.
A favorite treat, often enjoyed at Disney.
Fried chicken, mac and cheese, cornbread.
Often seen drinking large iced teas.

lifestyle_and_interests.details: Passion for studying law and advocating for wrongful conviction reform.
Highly organized pantry and closet spaces (e.g., jar organization).
Spending time with her children and the extended Kardashian-Jenner clan.

places.details: For Fashion Week (though with mixed history).
